author: vmassol
msg: Uses the nice default behavior of most containers which, by default, map the JNDI name for EJBs with the name defined in ejb-jar.xml... The EJB sample now works with Orion 1.x and Orion 2.x. Still not working with JBoss 3.x for some reason.

author: vmassol
msg: First cut at the EJB sample. It is not yet working as I still need to add JNDI mappings for the different containers. Also ATM, only containers not requiring pre-EJB compilation will work (i.e. JBoss and Orion, WebLogic will fail).

author: vmassol
msg: Remove leading "/" from context if any. That was causing problems when deploying an EAR on Orion. Seems to work fine now :-)

author: vmassol
msg: Added support for both WAR and EAR deployments in Orion. We need different configs in Orion. I wasn't able to find a common working config...
